name: VP1 Vintage Phaser
details:
Dial in authentic and classic 3-dimensional phase shifting effects
    Dedicated Rate control offers a range from rapid rotary speaker to impressive jet plane effects
    Tone switch provides negative and positive feedback modes for more or less detuned sounds
    Runs on standard 9V battery or optional power supply for full pedalboard integration
    True-bypass switching preserves your tone when the effect is off
